comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Daughter of a Georgia sheriff, Stanley Mattox: www.glynngen.com/~thecrypt/pinebarrens/#20 Married Florida attorney Oscar Miller: www.okefenokeepress.com/digest09-1913.html Married again sometime later, to James Monahan (1904-1978), senior editor at Reader's Digest; he was her co-author on the Lasker-award winning piece. She survived him. She died in 1981.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/11418107@N02] Thank you for providing this great information! 

Susannah
